title: Strengthening Instructional Competencies: Research-Practice Partnership (RPP) Model and Learning Study (LS)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Pedagogy or Educational Research
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core elements of the RPP model: trust-building, teacher capacity strengthening, and visible outcomes.
Learners propose simulation-based design solutions for educational problem-solving using the LS (Learning Sciences) approach.
Learners analyze challenges and resolution strategies when applying the RPP model in VR environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
